name: Shubham Kumar
label: Software Engineer
summary: I'm a Machine Learning Engineer with a focus on designing and deploying AI systems that address real-world challenges. My experience spans computer vision, natural language processing, and predictive modeling, with an emphasis on building scalable, production-grade solutions that drive measurable business outcomes. This portfolio highlights selected projects that reflect both my technical contributions and ongoing work in applied machine intelligence.
